description:
Multi-purpose runners for multi-surface routes, these hybrid trail runners take you from pavement to trail. A protective toe cap and shock-absorbing heel keep you moving over rocks and roots. The breathable, ripstop mesh upper keeps your feet cool during hard miles, and the MaxTrac™ outsole provides traction without losing flexibility.

  • Ripstop mesh uppers are quick to dry and have a toe cap for durability
  • Altra EGO™ EVA midsole provides a responsive yet soft feel
  • Zero-drop design encourages a natural running gait
  • Balanced Cushioning™ Promotes better form and foot alignment while reducing impact
  • Footshape™ gives your feet more space allowing them to sit naturally
  • MaxTrac™ rubber outsole provides traction on all types of terrain
name: Altra Outroad Trail Running Shoes - Men's
